articles.author: Adam B. Vary
articles.title: ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ Finds Its New Showrunner, Hires Directors From ‘Loki’ and ‘Moon Knight’ - Variety
articles.description: The Disney+ revival of "Daredevil" has landed a new showrunner and directors amid a major creative overhaul of the Marvel Studios series.
articles.content:
“Daredevil: Born Again” has found its new creative team.
Dario Scardapane, who wrote and executive produced on Netflix’s Marvel series “The Punisher,” will serve as the showrunner for the new “Dared… [+2412 chars]

articles.author: Brian Davids
articles.title: ‘Loki’ Head Writer Eric Martin Talks Episode Four’s Explosive Ending: “There’s Meaning in All of It” - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: With two episodes left, Martin promises the path to the finale "is not going to be the straight line that we expect."
articles.content:
[This story contains spoilers for Loki season two, episode four, “Heart of the TVA.”]
